languages.text: When this creature attacks, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. If the target fails, it becomes {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда это существо атакует, цель выполняет {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и при провале оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедлена{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

traits.locale_text: When this creature attacks, the target must pass a Toughness resistance test. If the target fails, it becomes {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

When this creature attacks, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. If the target fails, it becomes {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: Когда это существо атакует, цель выполняет {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и при провале оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедлена{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
languages.original_text: When this creature attacks, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. If the target fails, it becomes {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: 此生物攻击时，目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}。如果目标未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: When this creature attacks, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. If the target fails, it becomes {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 此生物攻击时，目标需要进行坚韧抗性检定。如果目标未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: この生物が攻撃するとき、ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}抵抗判定{/g}に合格しなければならない。ターゲットが失格した場合、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}速度低下{/g}状態になる。
languages.original_text: When this creature attacks, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. If the target fails, it becomes {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この生物が攻撃する時、ターゲットは耐久力抵抗テストに合格しなければならない。ターゲットが失格した場合、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}速度低下{/g}状態になる。

languages.text: Cuando esta criatura ataca, el objetivo realiza una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}. Si falla, queda {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text: When this creature attacks, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. If the target fails, it becomes {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando esta criatura ataca, el objetivo realiza una prueba de fortaleza de Resistencia. Si falla, queda {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text: Greift diese Kreatur an, muss das Ziel eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeits{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} bestehen. Besteht das Ziel nicht, wird es 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g}.
languages.original_text: When this creature attacks, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. If the target fails, it becomes {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Greift diese Kreatur an, muss das Ziel eine Zähigkeits-Widerstandsprobe bestehen. Besteht das Ziel nicht, wird es 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g}.

languages.text: Lorsque cette créature attaque, la cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} lié à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}. Si elle échoue à ce test, elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: When this creature attacks, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. If the target fails, it becomes {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque cette créature attaque, la cible doit réussir un test lié à la Résistance. Si elle échoue à ce test, elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
